Title: Mendeley Windows Phone Client
Description: Mendeley Windows Phone Client provides the ability to access Mendeley website and conduct its related public and private operation on any Windows Phone 7.5 enabled devices using the native Silverlight user interface.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Mendeley Windows Phone Client provides the ability to access Mendeley website and conduct its related public and private operation on any Windows Phone 7.5 enabled devices using the native Silverlight user interface.
